snippet: Herman Cornejo and Misa Kuranaga were among those performing works by Avi Scher at the Alvin Ailey Citigroup Theater.
abstract: Brian Seibert reviews premiere dance performance of works by the young choreographer Avi Scher, featuring dancers Herman Cornejo of American Ballet Theater and Misa Kuranaga of the Boston Ballet, at Alvin Ailey Citigroup Theater.
lead_paragraph: Herman Cornejo and Misa Kuranaga were among those performing works by Avi Scher at the Alvin Ailey Citigroup Theater.

headline.seo: Avi Scher & Dancers at Alvin Ailey Citigroup Theater
headline.main: A Creator Specializes in Getting Close Up
headline.print_headline: A Creator Specializes In Getting Close Up
